comment: EASIEST PROFESSOR IN THE WORLD. Everything is online. Use your resources. So easy. Group project is extremely easy. I barely had to think for this class. Just take him and you will see how easy he is. Don't buy the text book because you won't need it at all.

I really enjoyed his class. He tells all sorts of interesting stories and he can be really funny.  There are only 2 online tests and 1 group project. Not a hard class at all, I definitely reccomend this professor.
cool class! easy A! pretty interesting material.

This professor loves to correlate ethics with mistakes in history!  I absolutely love what I got out of this class!! Anyone should take this class because of the amount that you receive from it!  I sat down one day after class and we talked for literally an hour and a half about all the different things is life and it sticks with me to this day!!

The information was very helpful and informative for Business majors especially.  The Professor takes attendance and does grade the papers pretty hard, but its still a relatively easy class.  Don't let his appearance scare you because he does look mean, but he is a very nice man.  A lot of paper writing.
GREAT PROFESSOR!! He knows the subject very well and applies it to everyday situations which makes it very easy to understand. I would recommend taking his class.
very great prof. he takes attendance every class and if you don't show up no problem but that is one letter grade down. easy class.
Very cool person, as well as a great teacher

He has great personality and one of the best at KSU. He knows that students are taking this class as a business elective. There are some assignments which you need to spend some time on. However if you go to class and do the assignment, at least you will get a B. That's what I did. Final is easy. He takes roll and it will count to your benefit.
Really cool prof. Take him if you need an easy elective and you'll also learn a lot. We to do a lot of writing, but it was worth it.
Great professor. Learned a lot. Not an easy A, but not a hard class.
Best professor ever... Very understanding...and he loves discussions. I took two of his mgt classes for my business electives, and i made A's in both...

Awesome professor! Super nice and easy to talk to. 2 tests, midterm is a takehome and final was open notes. Plus, there are really no wrong answers, just give your opinion and make sure to back it up. Group presentation was easy. Classes are pretty much discussions btw him and the class about ethics. A few short papers throughout semester-easy!
